Name: ApgarTimingVS
Title: APGAR Score Timing
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent standard timings for APGAR assessments.

Name: BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassVS
Title: Birth and Fetal Death Financial Class
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent birth and fetal death financial class.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassCM.html).

Name: BirthAttendantTitlesVS
Title: Birth Attendants Titles
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthAttendantTitlesCM.html).

Name: BirthDeliveryOccurredVS
Title: Birth Delivery Occurred
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of place where birth or delivery occurred.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthDeliveryOccurredCM.html).

Name: BirthWeightEditFlagsVS
Title: Birth Weight Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Birth Weight Edit Flags.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-BirthWeightEditFlagsCM.html).

Name: DeliveryRoutesVS
Title: Delivery Routes
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Delivery Routes.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-DeliveryRoutesCM.html).

Name: EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsVS
Title: Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsCM.html).

Name: FertilityEnhancingDrugTherapyArtificialInseminationVS
Title: Fertility Enhancing Drug Therapy and Artificial Insemination Value Set
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fertility enhancing drug therapy and artificial insemination.

Name: FetalDeathCauseOrConditionVS
Title: Fetal Death Cause or Condition
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death cause or condition.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalDeathCauseOrConditionCM.html).

Name: FetalDeathTimePointsVS
Title: Fetal Death Time Points
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death time points.   Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalDeathTimePointsCM.html).

Name: FetalPresentationsVS
Title: Fetal Presentations
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. Only these codes are supported for exchange with NCHS.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-FetalPresentationCM.html).

Name: FetalPresentationsMaxVS
Title: Fetal Presentations - Max
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. It expands on the [FetalPresentationsVS](ValueSet-ValueSet-fetal-presentations.html) by including intensionally all codes for abnormal presentations,  as suggested by [FHIR-44554](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-44554).

Name: FetalRemainsDispositionMethodVS
Title: Fetal Remains Disposition Method
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Fetal Remains Method of Disposition. Fetal Remains Disposition Method Value Set differs from the related VRDR [MethodOfDispositionVS](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/vrdr/ValueSet-vrdr-method-of-disposition-vs.html) since it includes 'Hospital Disposition', but not 'Entombment'.

Name: InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthVS
Title: Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth. Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthCM.html).

Name: InformantRelationshipToMotherVS
Title: Informant Relationship to Mother
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent informants relationship to mother.

Name: LocationTypeVS
Title: Location Types
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes used to differentate transfer and birth locations

Name: NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesVS
Title: Newborn Congenital Anomalies
Descriptino: The valueset contains codes to represent newborn congenital anomalies. Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesCM.html).

Name: NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsVS
Title: Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsCM.html).

Name: ObstetricProcedureOutcomeVS
Title: Obstetric Procedure Outcome
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes that represent the successful or unsuccessful outcome of an obstretric procedure

Name: PerformedNotPerformedPlannedVS
Title: Performed NotPerformed Planned
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the status (performed, not performed, planned) of histological placental examinations.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-PerformedNotPerformedPlannedCM.html).

Name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
Title: Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-PregnancyReportEditFlagsCM.html).

Name: UnitsOfGestationalAgeVS
Title: Units of Gestational Age
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes for specifying the units used when recording gestational age (days, weeks.).  Reporting to NCHS is always in units of weeks, but other users of the associated [ObservationGestationalAgeAtDelivery](StructureDefinition-Observation-gestational-age-at-delivery.html) profile may want to record days.

Name: CigaretteSmokingBeforeAndDuringPregnancyVS
Title: Cigarette Smoking Before and During Pregnancy
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the number of cigarettes smoked in specific periods before and during pregnancy.

Name: ValueSetBirthAttendantTitlesVitalRecords
Title: Birth Attendants Titles Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles.  It is based on the original [PHVS_BirthAttendantTitles_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=7B108BDB-5F50-482F-9E9D-643EC75364A2) PHINVADS valueset.  This IG is the primary source for valuesets for use in vital records.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthAttendantTitlesVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetBirthplaceCountryVitalRecords
Title: Birthplace Country Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter Birthplace Country Codes from GEC and ISO 3166-1.  Includes historic countries that no longer exist.

Name: ValueSetEducationLevelVitalRecords
Title: Education Level Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent the Highest educational level achieved.    Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapEducationLevelVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetResidenceCountryVitalRecords
Title: Residence Country Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter Residence Country Codes from GEC and ISO 3166-1.  Excludes historic countries that no longer exist

Name: ValueSetRoleVitalRecords
Title: Role Vital Records
Descriptino: This value set contains codes that represent persons for whom some observations can be reported.

Name: ValueSetSexAssignedAtBirthVitalRecords
Title: Sex Assigned At Birth Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the subset of the US Core Birth Sex Valueset that can be used for a child or decedent fetus' Vital Records.    Mapping to IJE codes [here for child](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthSexChildVitalRecords.html) and [here for decedent fetus](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthSexFetusVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetStatesTerritoriesAndProvincesVitalRecords
Title: States
Descriptino: Territories and Provinces Vital Records
Uses: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter States and Provinces

Name: ValueSetUSStatesVitalRecords
Title: US States Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of 2 Letter codes used to represent the 50 US States and DC

Name: ValueSetUSTerritoriesVitalRecords
Title: US Territories Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of 2 Letter codes used to represent US Territories

Name: ValueSetYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords
Title: Yes No Not Applicable Vital Records
Descriptino: A set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Not Applicable.  It is based on the original [Yes No Not Applicable (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486) PHINVADS valueset.  This IG is the primary source for valuesets for use in vital records.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetYesNoUnknownVitalRecords
Title: Yes No Unknown Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Unknown.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapYesNoUnknownVitalRecords.html).

Name: PHVS_CauseOfFetalDeath_ICD-10_CDC
Title: Cause of Fetal Death ICD-10
Descriptino: This value set contains the ICD10 codes for causes   of fetal death as defined by the ICD-10-Mortality   Fetal Manual (2016).  Defined as the following,   a cause of fetal death is the morbid condition   or disease process, abnormality, injury, or poisoning   leading directly to fetal death. The initiating   cause of fetal death is the disease or injury,   which initiated the chain of morbid events   leading directly to death or the circumstances   of the accident or violence, which produced fatal   injury. A fetal death often results from the   combined effect of two or more conditions. These   conditions may be completely unrelated, arising   independently of each other or they may be causally   related to each other; that is, one cause may   lead to another which in turn, leads to a third   cause, etc.
